application.name: Statement Desk
application.shortDescription: Convert bank statements to Excel with AI-powered insights
application.longDescription:
Statement Desk revolutionizes financial data processing for businesses and individuals. Our AI-powered platform converts PDF bank statements into organized Excel spreadsheets, complete with intelligent categorization, anomaly detection, and financial insights.

**Key Features:**
• **AI-Powered Extraction**: Advanced OCR and NLP technology ensures 97% accuracy in transaction extraction
• **Smart Categorization**: Automatically categorize transactions with machine learning
• **Google Sheets Integration**: Export directly to Google Sheets with one click
• **Financial Analytics**: Get insights on spending patterns, cash flow forecasts, and budget recommendations
• **Anomaly Detection**: Identify unusual transactions and potential fraud
• **Multi-Bank Support**: Works with 200+ banks worldwide

**Perfect for:**
• Small business owners managing finances
• Accountants and bookkeepers
• Financial advisors
• Individuals tracking personal finances
• Teams collaborating on financial data

**Security & Compliance:**
• Bank-level encryption for all data
• GDPR and SOC 2 compliant
• No data retention after processing
• OAuth 2.0 secure authentication

detailedDescription.overview: Statement Desk is the most advanced bank statement conversion tool available, combining traditional data extraction with cutting-edge AI to deliver unparalleled accuracy and insights.

majorFeatures.title: AI-Enhanced Processing
majorFeatures.description: Our Claude AI integration provides 60% better accuracy than traditional OCR, understanding complex statement formats and extracting data that other tools miss.

majorFeatures.title: Smart Financial Insights
majorFeatures.description: Go beyond simple conversion - get AI-powered insights including spending trends, budget recommendations, and cash flow forecasts.

majorFeatures.title: Seamless Google Workspace Integration
majorFeatures.description: Export directly to Google Sheets, collaborate with your team, and integrate with your existing Google Workspace workflow.

majorFeatures.title: Enterprise-Grade Security
majorFeatures.description: Your financial data is protected with bank-level encryption, and we never store your statements after processing.
